entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
